Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Hoyne
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Damen, 51st, Western and 47th due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Damen, 51st, Western and 47th due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Fullerton.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
